title: Wall Street Breakfast July 7: Report: U.S. Weighs Capping Russian Oil at $40-$60 to Cut War Financing
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: U.S. weighs capping Russian oil at $40-$60 to cut war financing - Bloomberg. Boris Johnson to resign as UK prime minister. Federal Reserve officials saw potential to be more hawkish if inflation persists. Catch today’s WSB article here.
